description.value:
You gain one of the following powers of your choice. This new power replaces the daily attack power you gained at 1st level.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.sYzqcWXiTaOvPDR6]{Briar Thicket}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.6cR4LtOCTjfJU2qh]{Envenomed Steel}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.YturlFSy652KRk3Q]{Stonemetal}
